title: BEAUTIFUL PENTHOUSE in the HEART of PILSEN!!!
posting_body: BEAUTIFUL PENTHOUSE in the HEART of PILSEN!!!
Best Unit In The Neighborhood with a fabulous view of Chicago's beautiful skyline!
This stunning penthouse unit features beautiful hardwood floors and updated finishes throughout.
Enjoy an open floor plan with plenty of natural light, perfect for entertaining guests or enjoying a day at home.
Cooking is a breeze with a generous kitchen, beautiful countertops and stainless steel appliances.
When it's time to unwind, large bedrooms await, with plenty of closet and storage space.
Bathrooms include updated tile and vanity storage.
In unit washer and dryer, central heat and AC available in each unit.
Pets up to 35 LB pounds are welcome no aggressive breeds!
Conveniently located in the Heart of Chicago/Pilsen neighborhood, travel is a breeze! 5 minute drive to Eisenhower 290 Expressway and Kennedy 90/04 expressway.
Public transportation is steps away (CTA Pink Line Western Station, CTA buses) making it a breeze to get to UIC, Chicago Medical District, The Loop and more.
Short walk to grocery stores, shopping, etc.
All well qualified candidates must have: -No
Evictions or Collections with Utility Companies -Proof of income -First month rent and $325 non refundable move in fee is due at lease signing -Credit score of 600 or higher (or co-signer)
TEXT SANDY TO SCHEDULE A VIEWING 8479702541
